page.title: 03Coventry Landscape & Legend
page.content: Transport in the area is provided by a Bus Service. There are Taxi Services and several large central car Parks. A new Bus Station is being built in Cox St near to the main bus station at Pool Meadow. The landscape is urban with many modern buildings. But the landmark of Coventry, the Three Spires, can still be seen as can also the chimneys of Courtaulds Factory in Foleshill, just behind Cash's Factory which is famous for woven silk work. Representatives from Trade, Industry and Ethnic Groups take part inthe annual event of the Coventry Carnival. The unselfish act of Lady Godiva of Coventry legend is remembered every year as her horseback ride through the city is re-enacted in the procession.
